entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
